turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some new games to play. I really enjoy RPGs and strategy games. Any recommendations?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Based on your preferences for RPGs and strategy games, I can suggest a few titles. For RPGs, have you tried 'Divinity: Original Sin 2'? It's critically acclaimed. For strategy, 'Civilization VI' is a classic. Would you like more suggestions or perhaps something else?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Divinity: Original Sin 2, I've heard of that one. I'm not sure about Civ VI, though. My computer is pretty old, so I am not sure it would be able to run it. Are there any strategy games that are less graphically demanding, maybe something older?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. Finding games compatible with older hardware can be tricky. Let me look into some less demanding strategy titles. Hmm, for something older, perhaps 'Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition'? It has updated graphics, but the core gameplay is still the same. It should run well on most systems. Another option is 'StarCraft: Brood War' if you're into real-time strategy. I also found 'XCOM: Enemy Unknown', which is a turn based strategy game with lower requirements. Sorry for the delay on that one!

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Age of Empires II sounds promising, and I do like turn-based strategy too! Thanks for the help - you really did the trick there. I might need to try out XCOM, but it looks a bit complicated... But overall, I'm satisfied. Thanks again!
